page.title: 06Surfing
page.content: Surfing is a sport that many people in Penwith like.Most of the surfers either go to{Gwenver}or{Sennen}beach. {Porthcurno}and{Porthlevan}some times have good surf but it is not good all of the time because they are on the South coast and most of the storms and hurricanes are in the Atlantic Ocean which means that the best surf is usually to be found on the north and west facing coasts. People from all over {Great Britain come to stay at{Skewjack,}a Surf village near{Sennen.}Some people come to surf at {Sennen Surf Club.}But you do not stay there. {Skewjack}is a good place. It is a whole village. There is a swimming pool,surf shop,and a movie place where you see can see surf movies. There is a disco,and a pub. When the surf is flat people practise their skills on skateboards.
